import React from 'react'; import { loadStripe } from '@stripe/stripe-js'; import { Elements } from '@stripe/react-stripe-js'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody } from 'reactstrap'; const promise = loadStripe( 'pk_test_51BszDrB83NmCeu8Qrm7f8N8uJRMiNBhUNFddPZgQIyQhL6OPEQIA0d2ujQGwj14EQzlt7ZIsD5UFZQ2wyQELis9T00iMhLM3lR' ); const StripeDemo = () => { return (

Stripe Demo

Use this form to make a payment with Stripe! Don't worry the form is a demo only and cannot actually charge cards.

Demo Data

Use The following Data in the credit card field:

  • Card Number: 4242-4242-4242-4242
  • Exp: 02/24
  • CVV: 424

What else can Stripe Do?

Stripe is a very powerful payment API used all over the world. I am familiar with using Stripe to set up single payments, subscriptions, and more! Let me know what you want to accomplish and I'll make it happen.

Make a Payment
); }; export default StripeDemo;
